translations: 质量，（尤指人的）能力；（管子、枪炮的）口径，（子弹的）直径；（管、血管或纤维等圆截面的）直径

sentences.sentence: The firm needs more people of your calibre.
sentences.translation: 公司需要更多像你这样有才干的人。

sentences.sentence: The calibre of teaching was very high.
She was hit in the head by a.22-calibre bullet.
sentences.translation: 她的头部被一颗直径为0.22的子弹击中。
